athishura ranasenewiyeku se prakata matis pathkirimedi ema karuna nosalaka harinnata siyallantama siduwuye me dinawala lowama gilagath thrasthawadaya mada pawathwimata pramukha karyabharayak itukarana amerikawata ema karuna sarthaka kara ganimata ohu wanneku aarakshaka lekam putuwata awashya bawini.matis pathkirima sambandhayen sakachcha kirimata kamituwa ras wu awasthawedi tramp loliyeku nowana arisonawe senet sabhika jon maken pawa pawasa sitiye janaral jems matis yanu ohuge paramparawe wishishtathama sebalun atharin keneku bawaya.

rate daruwange anagathaya saha adhyapanaya pilibanda niwaradi dakmak palakayanta thibiya yuthuyi- janapathi kowid 19- aasadithayin 188k sinama shala himiyanta ha dushkaratha athi sinama silpinta chithrapata sansthawen sahana wadihiti, aabadhitha, wakugadu dimana sadaha rupiyal miliyana 3057k gewa awasan agosthu 28, 2019 rate daruwange anagathaya saha adhyapanaya pilibanda niwaradi dakmak rate palakayanta thibiya yuthu bawa janadhipathiwaraya lesa thama wishwasa karana bawa janadhipathithuma pawasayi.

2011 marthu 06 wana dina lamun 15 deneku thappa ha danwim puwaruwala rajya wirodhi satan pata liyamin wirodhatha dakwimen pasu wa asad rajaya owun siragatha kota amanushika lesa wadhabandhanawalata lak kirima nisa urana wunu siriyanu janatha wirodhaya (ehidi wayasaawurudu 13 k wu hamsa-alkatid daruwa ghathanayawiya) thawa duratath wardhanaya wimata wiya.
